mapper.select: SELECT DETAIL_CATEGORY_ID, SUB_CATEGORY_ID, DETAIL_CATEGORY_NAME FROM DetailCategory
SELECT DETAIL_CATEGORY_ID, SUB_CATEGORY_ID, DETAIL_CATEGORY_NAME FROM DetailCategory WHERE DETAIL_CATEGORY_ID = #{detailCategoryId}

SELECT dc.DETAIL_CATEGORY_ID AS detailCategoryId, dc.FOREIGN_SUB_CATEGORY_ID AS foreignSubCategoryId, dc.DETAIL_CATEGORY_NAME AS detailCategoryName, sc.SUB_CATEGORY_ID AS subCategoryId, sc.SUB_CATEGORY_NAME AS subCategoryName, mc.MAIN_CATEGORY_ID AS mainCategoryId, mc.MAIN_CATEGORY_NAME AS mainCategoryName FROM DetailCategory dc JOIN SubCategory sc ON dc.FOREIGN_SUB_CATEGORY_ID = sc.SUB_CATEGORY_ID JOIN MainCategory mc ON sc.FOREIGN_MAIN_CATEGORY_ID = mc.MAIN_CATEGORY_ID WHERE dc.FOREIGN_SUB_CATEGORY_ID = #{subCategoryId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DetailCategory (FOREIGN_MAIN_CATEGORY_ID, FOREIGN_SUB_CATEGORY_ID, DETAIL_CATEGORY_NAME) VALUES (#{foreignMainCategoryId}, #{foreignSubCategoryId}, #{detailCategoryName})
